reasoning: Bone metastases occur in ~70% of breast/prostate cancer patients and 30-40% of lung cancer patients. Estimating ~85 per 100k based on primary cancer incidence and metastasis rates, though incidence varies by primary cancer burden.
source: Coleman RE. Clinical features of metastatic bone disease and risk of skeletal morbidity. Clin Cancer Res. 2006;12(20 Pt 2):6243s-6249s
